result.reason: Feature request to add text search (Ctrl+F) within terminal session output (SSH/Telnet), improving usability for long sessions
result.approach: Add a search bar overlay (Ctrl+F) to connection panels that searches the terminal scrollback buffer; for PuTTY-based sessions this requires interacting with the embedded PuTTY window's text buffer or implementing a capture-and-search layer

attempts.raw_output: {"decision":"implement","reason":"Feature request to add text search (Ctrl+F) within terminal session output (SSH/Telnet), improving usability for long sessions","priority":"P3-enhancement","estimated_files":["mRemoteNG/UI/Window/ConnectionWindow.cs","mRemoteNG/Connection/Protocol/PuttyBase.cs","mRemoteNG/UI/Tabs/ConnectionTab.cs"],"approach":"Add a search bar overlay (Ctrl+F) to connection panels that searches the terminal scrollback buffer; for PuTTY-based sessions this requires interacting with the embedded PuTTY window's text buffer or implementing a capture-and-search layer"}
